lead_paragraph: Teams in the Grand Tours and several other key races will have one less rider from next season in order to improve safety and enhance the spectacle for fans, race organizers said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Cycling : Major Race Organizers Reduce Number of Riders Per Team
headline.main: Cycling : Major Race Organizers Reduce Number of Riders Per Team
